errors.useAutocomplete: Use the autocomplete for better results.
errors.invalidMember: I couldn't find that member in this server.
errors.invalidID: I couldn't find a punishment with that ID.
errors.duration: The duration must be between {min} and {max}.
errors.cannotInteract: You can not interact with this.

close.invalidChannel: You may only run this command in a ticker channel.
close.invalidUser: I wasn't able to find the user, did you change the channel topic?
close.deleting: This ticket will be deleted in 10 seconds...
close.embed_description: Your ticket was closed by a staff member. If you got other questions in the future, feel free to ask them!

blacklist.added: **{user}** was added to the modmail blacklist.
blacklist.removed: **{user}** was removed from the modmail blacklist.

open.noBot: You can not open modmail tickers for bots.
open.exists: Looks like this user already has a ticket opened at {- channel}
open.blacklisted: {user} is blacklisted from opening modmail tickets.
open.embed_description:
**A wild ticket has appeared!**
You've received a direct modmail from a staff member in {guild}. If you're wondering of how this ticket got opened, be patient until the moderator contact from through this ticket.
open.cantDM: This user doesn't accept direct messages or has blacked the bot. Could not open the modmail.
open.opening: Opening a modmail ticket, please wait...
